timeline.bodyText: Consider creating a separate method (e.g. alignUp2MiB) and possibly add a comment indicating why this is done
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText: Also, do we need the -4KiB adjustment with today's allocation strategies? The config comment mentions this as being done to avoid hitting the next malloc size class, but I'm not sure if this is relevant now.

replies.bodyText: Separated out the 2MB alignment and removed the 4k reservation. Also updated the description.

Argh, using intellij generate metod adds a default that is easily forgotten.
Fixed and added test.
